articles.title: You Can Get Over 60 Indie Games And Help The Environment For The Cost Of A Melbourne Coffee - Press Start Australia
articles.description: Right now, open video game marketplace itch.io is offering one heck of an indie game bundle in the name of a good cause. The World Land Trust bundle is going for a minimum donation of USD $4.99 (approx AUD $7) and includes over a whopping 60 indie video games…
